participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subj_resp_alc_1a.Description: The first 5 times you ever drank: a. How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel different? (where you could feel an effect). DO NOT count sips taken as a child. | If never, enter "0" // Please tell us about your ACTUAL EXPERIENCE DRINKING Alcohol (Beer, Wine, or Liquor). Please answer each question as accurately as possible. Give only one answer for each question. *PLEASE DO NOT GIVE RANGES (I.E., DON'T LIST 4-6 DRINKS; WRITE 5). TO FILL OUT THIS FORM: One drink of alcohol = 12 oz. beer, 5 oz. glass of wine, or a single shot (1.5) of hard alcohol alone or in a mixed drink.

Levels.WRITE 5). TO FILL OUT THIS FORM: One dri: 12 oz. beer, 5 oz. glass of wine, or a single shot (1.5) of hard alcohol alone or in a mixed drink.

subj_resp_alc_2a.Description: b. How many drinks did it take for you to begin to feel a bit dizzy or to begin to slur your speech? | If never, enter "0" // Please tell us about your ACTUAL EXPERIENCE DRINKING Alcohol (Beer, Wine, or Liquor). Please answer each question as accurately as possible. Give only one answer for each question. *PLEASE DO NOT GIVE RANGES (I.E., DON'T LIST 4-6 DRINKS; WRITE 5). TO FILL OUT THIS FORM: One drink of alcohol = 12 oz. beer, 5 oz. glass of wine, or a single shot (1.5) of hard alcohol alone or in a mixed drink.

subj_resp_alc_3a.Description: c. How many drinks did it take for you to begin stumbling, or walking in an uncoordinated manner? | If never, enter "0" // Please tell us about your ACTUAL EXPERIENCE DRINKING Alcohol (Beer, Wine, or Liquor). su_alc_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'

subj_resp_alc_total_first.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during the first 5 drinking episodes | Recode any response  greater than 0 to 1; sum(subj_resp_alc_1a_05035c,  subj_resp_alc_2a_09e4a7, subj_resp_alc_3a_f9590b, subj_resp_alc_4a_0fff0a)

subj_resp_alc_total_6mo.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during in the past 6 months | Recode any response greater than 0 to 1   sum(subj_resp_alc_1b_c49b04, subj_resp_alc_2b_1eda1e, subj_resp_alc_3b_673be8, subj_resp_alc_4b_d85033)

subj_resp_alc_total_heavy.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during their heaviest drinking period | Recode any response greater than 0 to 1; sum(subj_resp_alc_1c_1094b2, subj_resp_alc_2c_e373ab, subj_resp_alc_3c_a49455, subj_resp_alc_4c_2fbe55)

subj_resp_alc_total_first_i.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during the first 5 drinking episodes | Recode any response greater than 0 to 1; sum(subj_resp_alc_1a_I, subj_resp_alc_2a_I, subj_resp_alc_3a_I, subj_resp_alc_4a_I)

subj_resp_alc_total_6mo_i.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during in the past 6 months | Recode any response greater than 0 to 1;  sum(subj_resp_alc_1b_I, subj_resp_alc_2b_I, subj_resp_alc_3b_I, subj_resp_alc_4b_I)

subj_resp_alc_total_heavy_i.Description: Number of subjective experiences from drinking alcohol during their heaviest drinking period | Recode any response greater than 0 to 1;  sum(subj_resp_alc_1c_I, subj_resp_alc_2c_I, subj_resp_alc_3c_I, subj_resp_alc_4c_I)
